greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 1 + 2*a(A064216(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, after which for even n, a(n) = 2*a(n/2), for odd n, a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A064989(n-2)).
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = If[EvenQ@ n, 2 a[n/2], 1 + 2 a[Times @@ Power[If[# == 1, 1, NextPrime[#, -1]] & /@ First@ #, Last@ #] &@ Transpose@ FactorInteger[(n - 1) - 1]]]; Table[a@ n, {n, 83}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 23 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 16 2016
